0.1.1.name: connect20/Bongo_Checkout
0.1.1.description: Bongo Checkout is a new international checkout process in which all orders enter Magento as a domestic shipment. This means that all merchants have to do is fulfill more domestic orders. No need for additional paperwork, compliance checks, or hassle.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
